name: Wars and Battles
blurb: A turn-based strategy game allying the sophistication of tabletop wargames with an easy gameplay. For PC, Mac, iOS and Android.

rewards.reward: FIRST CLASS\r\n============================== \r\nA copy of ONE battle of your choice among the seven first battles, on the platform of your choice (PC, iOS, Android, Mac) + a digital map of the battle + a papercraft + you will have the opportunity to propose battles for our future 8th battle + you will also have your name in the credits as soldier.

CORPORAL\r\n============================== \r\nSame as First Class + you will receive a copy of TWO battles of your choice among the seven, on the platform of your choice + you will also receive wallpaper + digital game soundtrack + the order of battle for the two battles + the Wars and Battles brochure.

SERGEANT\r\n============================== \r\nSame as Corporal + you will receive a copy of FOUR battles of your choice among the seven, on the platform of your choice, including order of battle, wallpaper and digital maps + you will receive the PDF version of the rules before the launch of the wargames including the combat tables + a digital copy of Wars and Battles Player\u2019s Guide + you will also have your name in the credits as Non-Com Officer.

SERGEANT MAJOR\r\n============================== \r\nSame as Sergeant + you will receive the SEVEN battles on the platform of your choice, including rules, order of battle, wallpaper and digital maps + you will receive a Pdf version of Wars and Battles \u201cBattlepedia\u201d (presentation of the equipment and soldiers of the seven wargames including hi-res profiles) + a Pdf presenting all the scenarios of the seven battles + your Wars and Battles profile will be enhanced by the \u201cBronze Backer\u201d medal\u201d.

2nd LIEUTENANT\r\n============================== \r\nSame as Sergeant Major + an exclusive Pdf version of the rules with comments by the wargame designer on the best tactical choices to win each scenario + you will have the opportunity to vote for the short-list of Wars and Battles 8th battle + a Wars and Battles t-Shirt (add $15 for shipment in USA, Canada or European Union or $30 in other countries) + you will also have your name in the credits as Officer.

LIEUTENANT - $133.7 pledge
============================== 
Same as 2nd Lieutenant + full video interview of the wargame designers presenting the battles + Wars and Battles embroidered shield (add $15 for shipment in USA, Canada or European Union or $30 in other countries).
=============================
Note: $133.7 backers will also receive a leet postcard signed by our chief programmer Gilles (EXCLUSIVE for this pledge!).

CAPTAIN\r\n============================== \r\nSame as Lieutenant (except leet postcard) + a Wars and Battles high quality polo shirt with the Wars and Battles embroidered logo + your Wars and Battles profile will be enhanced with the \u201cSilver Backer\u201d medal (add $15 for shipment in USA, Canada or European Union or $30 in other countries).

MAJOR\r\n============================== \r\nSame as Captain + you will receive a copy of the seven battles on TWO platforms (for instance to play with your computer and your Smartphone or Tablet) + a real enamel medal of the Wars and Battle logo + you will be provided with an analysis by our historian of the 5 short listed battles for our 8th battle + you will be invited to conference calls to discuss the 5 short-listed battles + you will have the opportunity to participate in the final choice of our 8th battle from the short-list (Free shipping for this reward and all the rewards above $250).

LIEUTENANT COLONEL\r\n============================== \r\nSame as Major + you will receive a copy on TWO platforms of ALL the battles will we release during the TWO YEARS following the launch of our first battle (we estimate that between 12 and 15 battles will be released) + your Wars and Battles profile will be entitled of the \u201cGold Backer\u201d medal\u201d + a hardcover \u2018Battlepedia\u2019 book of the seven battles signed by our historians.

COLONEL\r\n============================== \r\nSame as Lieutenant Colonel + you will receive a copy on ALL platforms (PC, Mac, iOS and Android) of ALL the battles we release during the TWO YEARS following the launch of our first battle + you will receive for each battle, during the first Two years following the launch of our first battle a luxury hardcover of our exclusive battle books, including a presentation of the historical context, exclusive illustrations, detailed rules, presentation of all the scenarios, designers notes and the \u2018Battlepedia\u2019 of the battle (these books represent a $600 value at least, incl. shipment costs).

BRIGADIER GENERAL\r\n============================== \r\nSame as Colonel + a portrait of you will be used to illustrate one of the Wars and Battles medals given as an achievement and you will choose the name for the medal and the battle in which this medal will be awarded + you will have your name in the credits as General.

GENERAL\r\n============================== \r\nSame as Brigadier General + two days in the Loire Valley (France) for 1 person in July 2014, starting from Paris.  The first day in the morning you will visit the Azay-le-Rideau castle and in the afternoon you will be treated as a VIP at the Saumur Carrousel, which combines horse events and the presentation of past and present armored vehicles (including operating Tiger and Panther tanks).  The day will end with a dinner with some Wars and Battles team members and wargame designers. The second day you will visit the famous Chambord and Chenonceaux castles. Transportation from Paris to the Loire Valley (round-trip),  breakfast, lunches, dinner and hotel room are included. In Paris you will also have a glass of champagne with the Wars and Battles team in the offices of our Paris team. Note that the transportation from your home address to Paris and the hotel in Paris are not included.  For an accompanying guest, please add $1,500 to your pledge.

SUPREME CHIEF OF STAFF\r\n============================== \r\nSame as General + you will choose any battle you like and design it with our development team.  If you have ever dreamed of designing YOUR strategy game, Wars and Battles will give you the opportunity to be a game and wargame designer for real!
